Mike Pence shut the door today on a run for the presidency, but left wide open the likelihood that he'll seek a different office: Governor of Indiana. "In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana," Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters. Gabrielle Giffords began breathing without a ventilator yesterday as doctors took out the breathing tube that had run down her throat and replaced it with a tracheotomy tube in her windpipe. Surgeons also inserted a feeding tube.
